hero.title: USD.ONLINE
hero.subtitle: Moral Alpha 3.0
hero.description: Cross-chain Alpha Engine • Adaptive Yield Rotation • Decentralized Staking Vault • Blockchain's Conscience + Financial Integrity + Charity's Glory

crossChainEngine.title: Cross-chain Alpha Engine
crossChainEngine.description: Millisecond arbitrage and MEV operations, capturing instantaneous value in capital gaps
crossChainEngine.eyeDesc: It captures instantaneous value in capital gaps within multi-chain ecosystems, completing arbitrage and MEV operations at millisecond speed.
crossChainEngine.advantage1: Cross-chain shuttle, capturing the most subtle price cracks
crossChainEngine.advantage2: MEV harvesting, including Sandwich attacks and time value arbitrage
crossChainEngine.advantage3: Quantum engine of financial civilization, making every capital flow surgical precise
crossChainEngine.summary: In one sentence: This is the quantum hunter on the capital battlefield.

aiRotation.title: AI Adaptive Yield Rotation
aiRotation.description: GPT-4 driven wealth brain, mainstream asset trend prediction and automatic rebalancing
aiRotation.brainDesc: It fuses GPT-4's reasoning capability with real-time on-chain data pulsation, becoming a wealth brain capable of self-learning and rebalancing.
aiRotation.assetRange: Asset Range: BTC, ETH, SOL and other mainstream assets
aiRotation.rebalanceFreq: Rebalancing Frequency: Dynamic adjustment based on market signals
aiRotation.advantage1: AI is not just a tool, but the senses and intuition of capital
aiRotation.advantage2: Mainstream cryptocurrency trend prediction → converted to automatically executed yield flows
aiRotation.advantage3: Algorithm as investment manager, never tired, never fearful, never greedy
aiRotation.summary: In one sentence: This is the resonant body of wealth and intelligence.

defiVault.title: Decentralized Staking Vault
defiVault.description: Structured capital rhythm, perfect fusion of circular staking and leverage
defiVault.heartDesc: Through LSD staking and stablecoin mechanisms, it designs a structured capital rhythm that is both stable and efficient.
defiVault.advantage1: Staking as liquidity: capital no longer sleeps, but multiplies
defiVault.advantage2: Leverage as efficiency: letting the same unit of capital release multiple energies
defiVault.advantage3: Vault as civilization: it's not just a fund pool, but the stable pulse of wealth civilization
defiVault.summary: In one sentence: This is the symphonic vault of capital and trust.

transparentProtocol.title: On-chain Clear Transparent Protocol
transparentProtocol.soulDesc: In a financial world full of black box operations and centralized risks, it redefines the standard of trust through complete on-chain transparency.
transparentProtocol.verifiableLedger: On-chain verifiable ledger: All fund flows, strategy executions, charitable donations → publicly verifiable.
transparentProtocol.smartContract: Smart contract guardian: Every transaction, every dividend, every donation is automatically executed by immutable code.
transparentProtocol.realTimeAudit: Real-time audit mechanism: Not only transparent, but also allows all donors to become auditors at any time.
transparentProtocol.trustRedefinition: Redefinition of trust: from 'trusting people' to 'trusting mathematics'
transparentProtocol.transparencyStandard: Highest standard of transparency: every line of code is a public promise
transparentProtocol.participatoryAudit: Participatory audit civilization: letting every donor become a guardian of the system
transparentProtocol.summary: In one sentence: This is the moral cornerstone of wealth civilization.

conceptOrigin.title: 🔹 I. Concept Origin
conceptOrigin.alpha: • Alpha in finance = excess returns, representing the core competitiveness of investment strategies.
conceptOrigin.morality: • Morality/Ethics emphasizes public welfare, charity, social responsibility, belonging to values and civilization levels.
conceptOrigin.version: • 3.0 signifies an upgrade: from profit-oriented → win-win oriented → civilization-oriented.

evolutionLogic.title: 🔹 II. Evolution Logic
evolutionLogic.v1: • Moral Alpha 1.0 → Charitable Donations: wealth and goodwill separated, make money first then donate.
evolutionLogic.v2: • Moral Alpha 2.0 → ESG Investment: balancing returns with social responsibility, but still enterprise-focused.
evolutionLogic.v3:
• Moral Alpha 3.0 → Algorithm-driven × Embedded Charity × Global Co-construction:
Wealth growth and human goodwill are no longer separated, but dual returns of the same algorithm.
evolutionLogic.conclusion: Wealth growth and human goodwill are no longer separated, but dual returns of the same algorithm.

narrativeDefinition.title: 🔹 III. Narrative Definition
narrativeDefinition.desc1: AI + Blockchain driven excess return model,
narrativeDefinition.desc2: where excess portions not only convert to profits, but automatically flow into charitable civilization funds,
narrativeDefinition.mechanismDesc: In this system, morality itself is a type of Alpha. Stronger goodwill → Greater consensus → Wider capital flow → Higher investment returns.

motto.title: 🔹 V. Motto
motto.quote1: In the world of Moral Alpha 3.0, goodwill is no longer an extra cost, but the source of excess returns.
motto.quote2: Capital flows through algorithms and transcends through morality.
motto.quote3: Alpha is not just about excess returns, but the evolutionary dividend of financial civilization.

conclusion.title: 📌 Conclusion
conclusion.content1: Moral Alpha 3.0 can be designed as one of USD.online's philosophical cores, explaining why the project doesn't simply pursue profit, but integrates wealth + charity + civilization co-construction as a trinity.
conclusion.content2: Moral Alpha 3.0 = Perfect fusion of wealth civilization and charitable civilization

whitepaper.title: USD.online · Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: Unleashing Algorithmic Freedom · Converging Global Liquidity · Illuminating the Light of Human Kindness

preface.title: Preface
preface.content1: Human financial civilization is standing at a new threshold.
preface.content2: As AI becomes the main theme of our era, capital is no longer just cold numbers—it is the flow of narratives, the power of consensus, and the language of algorithms.
preface.content3: The birth of USD.online is not a simple innovation in charity, but a symphony of wealth civilization and human civilization. It echoes between contribution and philanthropy, turning every yield into warmth and protection for children with autism around the world.
preface.point1: • Yield from contribution = The power of public good
preface.point2: • Capital flows = The surging of kindness
preface.point3: • Wealth accumulation = The resonance of the world
preface.conclusion: USD.online is not only a stage for capital and philanthropy, but also a new chapter in human civilization.

vision.title: Project Vision
vision.content1: The mission of USD.online goes beyond maximizing returns—it aims to shape a new order where financial civilization and philanthropic spirit are intertwined.
vision.point1: • Algorithms become the language of freedom
vision.point2: • Narratives become the source of wealth
vision.point3: • Capital becomes the pulse of the world
vision.point4: • Public good becomes the brilliance of humanity
vision.conclusion: USD.online will stand as the builder of a dual order: global liquidity and human kindness. Here, wealth walks hand in hand with humanity, and technology advances side by side with philanthropy.

mission.title: Philanthropic Mission
mission.content1: The financial logic and charitable logic of USD.online are deeply coupled. We have chosen global autism care programs for children as the core direction of our philanthropy.
mission.commitment1: • A portion of net platform revenue → Dedicated donations to global autism foundations
mission.commitment2: • On-chain disclosure → Every donation flow is transparent and traceable, making "kindness visible, trust verifiable"
mission.value1: • Every donation is a seed of care
mission.value2: • Every yield is an echo of life
mission.value3: • Every contributor is a co-builder of public good
mission.conclusion: USD.online believes: capital does not only create wealth, it should also kindle the warmth of humanity.

strategy.title: Strategic Horizon
strategy.content1: The significance of USD.online goes beyond contribution. It is the convergence point of wealth civilization and philanthropic civilization:
strategy.point1: • It is an experimental ground for financial narratives
strategy.point2: • It is the confluence of technology and humanity
strategy.point3: • It is the symphony of global capital and philanthropic spirit
strategy.conclusion: The existence of USD.online is not just a tool for wealth accumulation—it is a collective leap forward in human financial civilization. What it creates is not only wealth, but a new paradigm of finance that resonates with humanity.

conclusion.title: Conclusion · Wealth Beyond Profit, Capital in Harmony with Charity
conclusion.content1: USD.online is not only the engine of wealth, but also the bridge of kindness.
conclusion.content2: It unites capital, AI technology, and philanthropy into one, converging into a financial civilization of the human future.
conclusion.content3: It is not merely a donation platform—it is a declaration of humanity's co-built civilization on-chain.

projectIntro.title: 🚀 USD.online · Project Introduction
projectIntro.subtitle: AI-Powered Global Liquidity Civilization Engine
projectIntro.transformation: The global financial system is undergoing a transformation unseen in a century:
projectIntro.point1: • Collapse of the Bretton Woods trust system
projectIntro.point2: • Digital extension of US dollar hegemony
projectIntro.point3: • Algorithmic civilization waves driven by AI
projectIntro.backdrop: Against this backdrop, USD.online is not just a platform, but an experimental ground for a new global capital order. It merges Wall Street's quantitative wisdom, Web3's decentralization spirit, and AI's intelligent computation into an international financial engine that transcends investment itself.

painPoints.title: Market Pain Points
painPoints.traditionalDesc: Cross-border capital flows are restricted by central banks, commercial banks, and clearing systems.
painPoints.cryptoDesc: CEX and DEX liquidity is siloed, with narratives lacking lasting value anchors.

tech.title: Technological Highlights
tech.alphaPoint3: • 10% performance fee, benchmarked against global top-tier funds
tech.rotationPoint1: • GPT-4 + on-chain big data trend forecasting
tech.rotationPoint2: • Dynamic rebalancing across BTC / ETH / SOL
tech.rotationPoint3: • 1–2% annual management fee, with institution-grade strategy transparency
tech.connectPoint1: • Bridges Binance, Coinbase, and on-chain liquidity
tech.connectPoint2: • Builds global arbitrage channels, making liquidity borderless
tech.transparentPoint3: • Establishes a new financial contract where algorithm = trust

whitepaper.visionStatement: USD.online = The Bretton Woods System 2.0 for the On-Chain Era

positioning.title: International Positioning
positioning.content1: USD.online is not a "product"—it is the prototype of future financial civilization.
positioning.content2: It represents the fusion of AI × DeFi × Meme × Stablecoin.
positioning.content3: It carries not just single returns, but a community order driven by global capital narratives.
positioning.content4: It symbolizes the reconstruction of the international financial system.
positioning.allow1: • AI → To become the financial language
positioning.allow2: • Capital → To become the global pulse
positioning.allow3: • Narratives → To become the source of wealth
positioning.allow4: • Kindness → To become the order of a new civilization
positioning.conclusion: USD.online is the next leap in human financial civilization.

fcaRegulation.title: UK FCA Regulatory Endorsement · Global Trust Foundation
fcaRegulation.intro: USD.online / Blue Light Compassion Coin has obtained compliance filing and regulatory authorization from the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).
fcaRegulation.description1: The FCA is one of the world's strictest and most respected financial regulatory bodies, with its regulatory framework hailed as the "golden standard of financial civilization."
fcaRegulation.description2: Obtaining FCA regulation not only signifies the project's legality and transparency but also represents its entry into the core circle of international capital and charitable financial civilization.
fcaRegulation.compliance: 📜 Legal Compliance: Project operations follow UK and international financial regulatory frameworks
fcaRegulation.transparency: 🔍 Public Transparency: All key data and fund flows are traceable and verifiable
fcaRegulation.protection: 🛡 Investment Protection: FCA regulation provides legal protection for global investors and charity partners
fcaRegulation.passport: 🌍 International Passport: FCA license is regarded as a "trust passport" in global capital markets
fcaRegulation.strategicIntro: With FCA certification, USD.online is not just a digital asset project:
fcaRegulation.anchor: • It is a trusted anchor point for global charitable financial civilization
fcaRegulation.testbed: • It is a compliant testing ground for AI × Blockchain × Charity integration
fcaRegulation.cornerstone: • It is the compliant cornerstone of the new generation capital order
fcaRegulation.conclusion: "FCA regulation empowers USD.online, making wealth and goodwill safer, more transparent, and more credible globally."

staking.title: Staking & Returns
staking.linear: • Returns accumulate linearly and can be claimed anytime.

fees.title: Management Fees & Early Withdrawal
fees.managementFee: • Management fee: 1% of deposit amount, goes to feeWallet.
fees.earlyWithdrawal: • Early withdrawal: 40% penalty (on principal), goes to feeWallet; rewards are not penalized and automatically distributed.

invite.title: Referral & Level System
invite.binding: • Binding: First deposit ≥200U required for binding, short code → address mapping; cannot be changed after binding, allows self-referral/circular referrals.
invite.teamStaking: • Team total staking: Real-time sum of net principal under custody for self + direct referrals + next level down (A+B+C); deducted upon redemption; used only for level determination.
invite.levelChange: • Level changes only affect future deposits, no retroactive adjustments.

settlement.title: Reward Settlement & Fund Flow
settlement.rewardBase: • Reward base: Calculated on gross deposit amount A (before 1% deduction).
settlement.distribution: • Distribution form: Each deposit immediately records into "claimable balance" (USDT), not immediate transfer.

usdo.title: USDo Stablecoin Mechanism
usdo.totalSupply: • Total supply cap: 100,000,000 tokens; decimals: 6 (consistent with USDT).
usdo.mintingRule: • Minting rule: Only minted during user self-investment at 5 USDo / 1 USDT instantly; does not participate in referral rewards.
usdo.capProtection: • Cap protection: If current deposit would exceed the limit, reject the deposit.
usdo.transferSwitch: • Transfer switch: USDo can be normally transferred and traded after the owner-controlled switch is enabled.
usdo.narrative: • Narrative: USDo targets stablecoin scenarios, with future plans for 1:1 USD exchange experience and clearing channels.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Q: Can I bind subordinates without initial deposit? A: No, you need an initial deposit ≥200U to bind.
faq.q2: Q: How long for rewards to arrive? A: Immediately recorded in "claimable balance" after deposit, can be claimed anytime.
faq.q3: Q: Does early withdrawal affect earned rewards? A: No, rewards are not penalized, only 40% penalty on principal.
faq.q4: Q: Does USDo give referral rewards? A: No, USDo is only for self-investment minting.

example.title: Example
example.scenario: User A deposits 1,000U (any staking period selected):
example.reward: • If superior is Lv3, direct referral reward = 12% × 1,000 = 120U; superior's superior gets 10% × 120 = 12U.
example.split: • Remaining amount after fees and rewards undergoes 50%/50% split.
example.usdo: • USDo minting: 5,000 USDo recorded for A; does not affect reward settlement.
